website_summaries.verdict: This simple MP3 player may not have all the bells and whistles, like shuffle and repeat, but it does well with the features it does have.
pros: Small with a clip-on attachment feature that works on goggle or swimsuit straps
Includes short cord earbuds with earpieces in three sizes
Buttons are simple and basic and the raised buttons help you control them by feel
Supports MP3, WMA, FLAC, APE formats
Uses USB cord to download songs

customer_reviews.title: As good as they get
customer_reviews.text: I love the blue color. My last one of these didn’t last too long but few of them do. Been swimming with them for 10+ years. This one is the easiest to change songs or volume due to its raised buttons. Sound is good, not as good as an iphone, but great for the pool. People will be asking you about it and where you got it. Buying songs from iTunes and changing to mp3 is an extra step but no big deal once you learn how. And you can listen to books as well as music. If you swim, get it.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Corcoran

customer_reviews.title: Loving swimming with this.
customer_reviews.text: I like swimming with music, I bought it and it's very cute. The volume is so loud it blocks out the sounds of screaming children in the pool. The control buttons are large and easy to use. The clip, which will attached to my goggles, can also be attached to clothing or the straps of backpacks. This product has versatility beyond swimming and can be used with activities in which you might get wet. Skiing or kayaking comes to mind. The player is elegant in its design. No rough edges and very smooth to touch. I will use it every day . Loving swimming with this.
customer_reviews.author: zizi

customer_reviews.title: Did not even make it through the first workout
customer_reviews.text: The Waterproof headset casing for an iPod shuffle that I've had for 10 years finally stopped working, so I decided to give this a shot for my new product. It didn't even make it through a 45-minute swim before it just... stopped. I've tried plugging it in to three different charging options, and I get zero response. Pretty disappointing to spend this much money on a product that couldn't even manage to work for 45 minutes. It also doesn't have great sound quality, but I don't expect a whole lot while I'm swimming - anything is better than nothing, which is what I ended up with.
customer_reviews.author: jackieisgreen

customer_reviews.title: Lap swimmers rejoice update - NOT
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Decent capacity and the best sound quality for lap swimming after years of trials and disappointments. Much better than the waterproofed ipod shuffles I've been using. Some quirkiness with file loading and file adjustments. Update - after less than 6000 yds swam total failure - cannot recommend
customer_reviews.author: MarkReif

customer_reviews.title: Great swim tunes!
customer_reviews.text: If had this for at least 12 months very dependable and lasts for 3 swims about a hour each . Can’t beat the price . I would suggest headphones rather than ear plugs. Just my preference! You do need to use Vaseline around the plugs for a seal . When I had a charging problem , the company responded right away . Just use a hairdryer on cool and dry the contacts . Voila perfect! 100% I would buy again! Beats my iPod shuffle at fraction the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thought I had finally one that works well.  Soon defective.
customer_reviews.text: At first: much better sound than the competition. Easy to set up, and comfortable to wear, too. But after ten uses, it has become un-usable. Cannot add anything. Crashes when attached to computer if I try to transfer a file to it. Only has a fraction of all it could hold onboard. Refuses to load anything else. Useless information online. Returned the first, got a second that is also, if differently, totally defective. This one does not, did not ever, load. It is simply unusable. Such a waste of time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonia

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: UPDaTE| Despite a few issues, this company has come through with follow up and replacement of a defective unit. They truly believe in their product. Glad I’ve got another chance to try this out. So far, so good. I really wanted to like this product. I used it for swimming laps. Few directions made loading music difficult to start. However, it was issues with the device being recognized by my computer after using it that caused me to send it back for a replacement. The replacement arrived in a timely manner, but this time, after one use, it was also returned because it simply stopped working. I couldn’t get it to come on at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Uh-oh!!  oh, no!!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't quite last six months, an hour, every-other day. But, the sound was good. Very disappointing after spending so much time/effort downloading music. Fortunately, as usual, Amazon made a full refund. I ordered same item again. Update: Replacement arrived. After several failed attempts to get computer to recognize device, realized the cable wasn't working. Scrounged up another cable that worked. Downloaded a couple songs and tested. Music transferred fine, but the VOLUME control didn't work. Sheesh. Will try another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I obtained this MP3 player to listen to audiobooks from my public library while swimming laps. I had several issues getting it to work. Part of that was just getting the books downloaded to the MP3 player but I finally got past that and then had problems with it jumping around within the book. I communicated with vendor and we finally worked it out by reformatting the device. Still, listening to books is difficult because you can't just back it up few pages when you'd like to. Other than that I'm very satisfied with this item and the difficulties I am currently experiencing are not with the MP3 player but just the way the books are formatted.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hazard

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE - Lasted a year
customer_reviews.text: I spent more than I wanted to hopefully get something that would be better. When it was working, I really liked it. It lasted one year and one month. I'm very disappointed and would like a refund. After posting my comment I was contacted by the company who issued a replacement, despite the fact that the warranty is generally only one year. I was very pleased with this, as other companies often don't even honor their own guarantees. To me, customer service is as important as the product and it also shows that the company stands behind its product. I swim all year round when possible, so hopefully, I'll get a lot of use out of the replacement MP3 player.
customer_reviews.author: Rafter

customer_reviews.title: Better than the expensive underwater Mp3s
customer_reviews.text: oh my gosh I am sooooo glad I purchased the Sewobye!!!! In the past 10 years I have used the modified Apple Shuffles and the batteries ran out within six months each and every time! I have used the Sewobye in the water (I swim in lakes) and on my bike for at LEAST 14 hours and have not had to recharge the battery! Another thing I LOVE is how easy it is to turn the volume up and down! Wish I had found this product a long time ago!!!
customer_reviews.author: tarzan

customer_reviews.title: Fine little machine with lousy headphones
customer_reviews.text: This little machine works fine and tolerates water like a champ but the ear phones that came with it weren't worth much. They had a tinny, no-bass sound and after one or two uses they started to be unreliable without periodically ramming the wires into the ear phones. I purchased better earphones and am now happy though that about doubled the price. Even with my cell phone headphones plugged in, which I know are good for base, it still has a bit of a tinny sound. It actually sounds better when your head is under water.
customer_reviews.author: HeidiCooksSupper

customer_reviews.title: Great product, sound is great for the compact size
customer_reviews.text: My item got here way faster than I anticipated and was just what I needed. I bought it to give it as a present to my brother who works as a tour guide in water caves in the mountains of Belize and is always getting his phones water damage. So now I loaded it with music for him to enjoy without water damaging it and the sound is great, perfect size and stylish... most Importantly the price is right for the quality I got. I really recommend it to anyone whose looking to listen to music and do their outdoors activities without worrying of dropping or water damage. 10 out of 10 stars
customer_reviews.author: victor ayala

customer_reviews.title: Better than the $$$$ stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Amazed at how durable and user-friendly this is. Took me a few sets of tips (including molded tips) to find some that would stay in my ear canal for flip turns. Makes an hour-long swim a pleasure...but if you're into audiobooks, finding your place ain't easy after turning off. Battery lasts about 30 to 40 hours of swimming. Perfect solution, once you find your earbud fit. Plenty loud over bubble sound, easy to adjust with buttons on back of head, and super easy to add and delete music. Playlist will play in order you added files. I recommend normalizing the volume through your tracks...or the volume will blow your head off on that ONE Portishead track!
customer_reviews.author: flounderguts

customer_reviews.title: I swim longer
customer_reviews.text: First one stopped loading from PC after first use. I dried it but apparently that’s not enough. Need to use hairdryer. They gave me a replacement for 1% of cost that has been working fine. The original cable doesn’t work with new device. The original device plays but doesn’t synchronized using new or original cable. The original device plays what’s loaded but I’ve listened to it all already. So no m satisfied with the device and customer service but not with quality control.
customer_reviews.author: jon harding

customer_reviews.title: None of my computers could detect 1st or 2nd (replacement) unit
customer_reviews.text: The first one when plugged in wouldn't register. Second one the same thing. Won't register on my windows or my other computer - I've never had an issue with any mp3 player. I've been using mp3 players in this way since probably 2003 non stop so before these guys try to make it seem like I'm some sort of novice let's get that out of the way... This thing is just defective all around. No way I could have 2 units and neither registers.
customer_reviews.author: Maven

customer_reviews.title: Definitely  Water  Resistant
customer_reviews.text: I am afraid to actually go swimming with this but I do use it to exercise and play with the kids in the sprinkler toys outside and it keeps on ticking. It has a decent battery life, well made and holds enough songs but the storage could be better. The shuffle feature sucks as it tends to play the same group of songs over and over and misses countless others that never get played. Not sure how to fix this. This is great as in the water I can't take my phone but I am a music girl and audio book girl so I c an still listen while playing with the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Ceballos

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for swimming laps!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I bought it a year ago and use it multiple times a week for swimming laps. I download a bunch of podcasts on the weekend onto it and it keeps me going all week. I love that it has different sized ear buds because I can use the smallest ones. I hate ear buds and refuse to use them on other devices, but these actually fit in my ears. I used a couple of small cable ties to secure it to my goggles and it stays in place. The battery life is great. I swim about 3-4 hours a week and have gone multiple weeks without charging.
customer_reviews.author: A. Phillippi

customer_reviews.title: Music in the flip turn!!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about in water players/earbuds, thinking I wouldn’t hear much. To my surprise the music sounds really good and podcasts are very clear. It clips to your goggles strap and is very secure in flip turns. Earbuds are pretty good, you have to jam them in firmly to get a good seal. Once in they also stay put during flip turns and underwater pushoffs. You tuck the slack wire in your goggles strap too. You have to let the MP3 player dry out before the usb connects properly to the computer. It takes iTune files as is, easy drag and drop to file explorer. Good buy, makes an hour swim fly by.
customer_reviews.author: D. Sander

customer_reviews.title: I like & recommend !
customer_reviews.text: I love this device. Works very well in the water. However, I've owned it a few months & it stopped working. Contacted support; they were amazing. Their reply was very fast & the replacement of the device was shockingly fast! Loved the nice emails from the support agent while trying to rectify my issue. I strongly suggest this device. Gave 4 stars bc it died in 10 months. Overall though, it works great; sounds wonderful in the water, I definitely would purchase again & appreciated the customer service support. Hope they continue to be of great service. Thanks for your help tech support!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I've used this waterproof player while swimming laps over the last 40 days and so far it works well. I swim laps 3 to 4 times a week for at least an hour a session. I've had two other brands of waterproof players, Diver and Apple shuffle and this brand is easy to operate and the sound is excellent. Choosing this brand was made since the waterproof Apple shuffle price has doubled and this model is affordable & much easier to operate than the Diver with the shuffle feature. So if this waterproof player lasts than it is worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: CCH

customer_reviews.title: Dry off and dry out the plug hole before using them they oil will last
customer_reviews.text: I just got my new Mp3 waterproof headphones and this is the second day I've used them I've had absolutely no problem with him I swim for over an hour just the way they come right out of the box they were really great just like my fourth set trying to find one that will work for me swimming laps and it looks like this may be the one so far so good
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Clear, crisp sound with plenty of volume
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many swimming mp3 headphones, and I like this one best. The sound is almost as good as an expensive regular headset, and the earbuds don't allow any water in the ear while giving you great volume so counteract the sound of water rushing by. I swim about a mile a day, and charge the unit every other day just to be sure I don't run out of battery. One suggestion - it would be nice if there was some vocal warning when the battery is low. Instead, it just stops and you could be at the beginning of a long swim. But otherwise, I'm very happy with this unit
customer_reviews.author: Michael H

customer_reviews.title: GREAT VERSATILE TOOL
customer_reviews.text: PROS: - Easy to use - Featherweight - Stays put inside ears, and that is a huge deal for me considering that I have really oily skin and ears that usually causes earphones of this sort to slip out. - Noise cancelling - Handy for Swimming as well as everyday use. - Has resonating sound quality that makes listening to music a very pleasurable experience. CONS: None. I love and would definitely recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Mfonabasi Ikpeikpe

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: I am very, very happy with this MP3 waterproof player. The battery didn't die during a 13.1 race or other long runs. My phone and Fitbit are always low in power bc of GPS tracking. The MP3 player helped to extend the batteries of my phone. For the race, I used a big headset, and for running in the rain, I use the earbuds that came with the MP3 player. It's effortless and comfortable to use while running and working out at the gym.
customer_reviews.author: A Person

customer_reviews.title: Not mac compatible..
customer_reviews.text: So far I am unable to make this device show up on my mac. I've spent a number of hours troubleshooting and I do know a fair amount about tech. Frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: MP3 player for swimming
customer_reviews.text: This is my second MP3 purchased for swimming. The first one purchased didn't work out (Tayogo). Easy to download music, easy to use in the water and good quality via the ear plugs. Battery life is good too. I used it once a week for about 30-50 minutes and recharge after 6 weeks. I used it occasionally for walking. So far, I am satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Leala Jew

customer_reviews.title: It's impressive!
customer_reviews.text: I've only used the product a couple of times, and it worked perfectly from day one. I had all my songs in Mp4 format already in my computer and that made it so easy. Once you plug into your computer, it works like a thumbdrive and you can just copy the songs in there. That easy. After that, you press play and listen to your songs. The buttons have grooves so I can find them easily to skip songs. The cord is just the right length. I don't dive, I swim laps, but the device gets soaked and it still works perfectly. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Raquel M Amarins

customer_reviews.title: changing my review due to refund and company sending a new one
customer_reviews.text: This was my 1st review “Was great if you can find a good way to put it on and swim without getting caught up in the wires, and it worked great for just over 1 month then completely quit. Would not hold a charge......so if you want to spend $50 for a possible 6 weeks weeks of swimming music go for it. I messaged the company with no response.” I now have had a response and refund and offer to try another. This is doing good business so at least for now I will change my 2 stars to 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Kieba

customer_reviews.title: Great to use in a bath!
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is AMAZING. I was very surprised. I don't swim but I used it to take baths. It drowns out all outside noise and you can relax and listen to music with it in the tub with you. It's like a little personal surround sound in your ears. Also the buttons are very simple and raised so even if you have soap in your eyes (which I did lol) you can press it without looking. Very good product. Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: RASHEDA L.

customer_reviews.title: Tried, returned and then tried again
customer_reviews.text: The ear buds wouldn't stay in my ears and when they did, the sound was muffled by the water, so I returned the player after using it twice. The refund was easy and the company cared about their product, so I re-ordered the player and tried again. This time the buds stayed in my ears and the sound was great during backstroke and breaststroke, but not freestyle. I still liked the product, so bought a swim cap to see if the cap helped; it didn't. Because of bad knees I also run in the pool, so will use the product while running. I want to give the product 5 stars but can't.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Playing audio books is unsuccessful!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to play audio books while I swim. I found the device to be good if you're just listening to random songs that you download, but the audio book files just get stacked as successive mp3s and there no way to find out what track you're listening to. I anyone knows a way around this please LMK. I think this has to go back. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Super Customer Service  (UPDATED from 2 Stars)
customer_reviews.text: Worked with me to solve my issue putting these on with my goggles. They sound and look great now! ORIGINAL POST: I have used a one-piece Pyle headset for years (1 star for them, many other issues), but they were super easy to put on. I tried at least 5 times too put these on with my goggles (sitting at my desk) and could not get them on and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Medugno

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t even last a month without a problem.
customer_reviews.text: I only used this MP3 Player 5 times and it stopped working. I clipped it in my bathing suit strap and kept my head out of the pool. I floated around so it really didn’t get submerged entirely. I am really disappointed because the sound was good but it didn’t last long. After doing some investigation I found the wire that went to the ear phones was faulty. I was lucky I accidentally found the problem because I have no electrical skills.
customer_reviews.author: Good Common Sense

customer_reviews.title: Very please.
customer_reviews.text: Before all of the gyms closed, I would swim once or twice a week at our athletic club and then just do beachbody workouts at home. This product has been my best waterproof MP3 player yet. My very first use, one of the ear pieces wasn’t working. I reached out to the company and they immediately sent me a replacement pair and a carrying case for the entire set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big Disappointment!!
customer_reviews.text: I've had nothing but problems with this MP3 player from the day I bought it! I think the device is fully charged and when I go swimming I hear about 5 seconds of music and then it quits! I have let the MP3 player charge overnight and still get the 5 seconds of music and the device shuts off! Seems like the MP3 player just will not take a full charge!
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: Does not work for more than ONE week.
customer_reviews.text: Bought one and it failed after one week. Got a return item it lasted about a week. What a waste of time and money. Do not buy this product! It has ok sound but for the price you only get a bout a weeks worth of product. Tested it twice will not buy again. Buyer be ware!
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: My son has loved this because he could download his music on to it. He is going into military so he has been doing PT and takes this with him. He likes that it is lightweight and waterproof..I would highly recommend this to anyone that does anything that you want listen to music.. It is very easy to use and easy to download music onto it..
customer_reviews.author: Tabatha

customer_reviews.title: Finally One That is Loud Enough
customer_reviews.text: It's certainly better than the average swim mp3 by many metrics from size (really the shape), battery life, and the fact it has headphones instead of in-construction listening (like Tayogo which eventually breaks because of stress differentiation on the connectors). But what is so key here, other than the reasonable price, is that the volume is actually loud enough for a swimming pool. I wonder how many other swim mp3 companies have even tested their products with actual swimmers. I have had to return several devices because I can't hear at maximum volume at the pool, let alone the ocean. This mp3 player is a bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Russell W Travison

customer_reviews.title: Great product with great customer service
customer_reviews.text: This mp3 player was a gift for my wife, she clips unit to her goggles and can enjoy her music while swimming laps. After about six months of use the headphones started cutting out. I contacted sewobye customer service through email and within a few messages back and forth to confirm the issue, they mailed out a replacement set of headphones. I can appreciate a company that stands by their products.
customer_reviews.author: Theo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third mp3 player for deep water aerobics. It is by far the best. The headphones stay in place even while swimming laps (with no cap) and jumping into the diving well. Other ones did not. Easy to use. Does not "lock" after a few minutes. Last one was very hard to unlock to change songs. Easy to load music (I already had songs formatted for mp3). Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Susan S

customer_reviews.title: Great product and reliable seller
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this product as a gift for my son. He is on a swim team and wanted to be able to listen to music while practicing. There are a few products on the market so we researched reviews and this MP3 seems to have the best reviews. We are very pleased with the product. The sound was great in the water, even in loud pool environment. Small, easy to use, small and convenient. I recommend this seller as they were fast, efficient and have wonderful customer service.
customer_reviews.author: christine kowalski

customer_reviews.title: music transferability
customer_reviews.text: The product is promising but it is not an easy transfer of music from device to device. You need to have your files in WIndows Media Player to open and transfer music to the Sewobye. It is cumbersome. It works well underwater but unsure of sound quality since so far I have only been able to transfer old music I owned in my hard drive. If you are looking for hassle-free music transfer, you may want to enquire more about the types of music files you want to put into this little device. Instructions are useless, btw.
customer_reviews.author: Nuria

customer_reviews.title: Great for Water Aerobics
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE the Sewobye waterproof MP3 player! Listening to motivating music while I push through my deep water aerobics program is simply fantastic! I workout everyday in the deep water for 45 minutes at the YMCA! It is my happy place - thanks to the rock n' roll favorite tunes playing in my ears - the time just flies by! It is so relaxing and inspiring to listen to music while I move through the water! I highly recommend the Sewobye MP3 player - excellent customer service to boot! No more excuses! Get the music and get moving!
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey J. Ladue

customer_reviews.title: excellent sound quality!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve gone through several waterproof iPods over the years - this has the BEST sound quality! The ear plugs are wonderful too! Although the iPods comes with few directions, support response was quick and helpful. Once the music was added the fun began! I’m SOOO pleased with the sound and comfort!!
customer_reviews.author: laura Carter

customer_reviews.title: Good Device and Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: The sound is excellent and the earplugs stay in my ears during swimming. The battery lasts as advertised. It was easy to convert files from my Macbook Pro to mp3 and move them to the device. Customer service is very responsive.
customer_reviews.author: English Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Lovve my waterproof MP3 player
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy with this product because I use it for swimming. It really makes my daily swim a lot more enjoyable. I’ve loaded my player with the Beatles, the Rolling Stones, The Beach Boys, etc. I was almost ready to buy an extra one just in case this one needed to be charged. I can’t do my swim without it now! I was so glad that someone recommended it to me this summer. Definitely worth it and it’s not expensive.
customer_reviews.author: smchich

customer_reviews.title: Corrupted hard drive, reformat it
customer_reviews.text: Only problem I had with the music player was when I connected it to the computer. Every time I tried to upload/drag a song the music player would crash/ disconnect because it said it was corrupted. I reformatted the music player. Then it behaved after that. It has worked great since then. Wish I could download different song formats however.
customer_reviews.author: christine

customer_reviews.title: Swimming at the Y
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for about a month for lap swims at the Y. In the pool about an hour, the sound quality is great, battery life is having only to charge once since original, have over 5 hours of music that was easily transferred to it. No special drying ... easily hooks onto my goggle strap.
customer_reviews.author: Alaska rocks... again and still

customer_reviews.title: Can’t keep the plug from trapping water in my ears
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item to help me focus on my swim regime. I am going through chemo, so my routine isn’t crazy hardcore. I chose this for the price and functionality. The sound was ok, loading music was a pain. It wouldn’t read the majority of the files. The ear plug was shoddy and allowed water in on one side. The first time use was a constant stop and restart just to readjust the fitting. The sound was average, no real complaints there. Unfortunately, this isn’t proving to be useful in the water for me.
customer_reviews.author: W. Bates

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: I swim almost every day and always listen to music during my workout. Other waterproof units I've bought in the past have all failed and I am so happy with this MP3 player. Clips onto my goggles without trouble and the raised volume/track buttons are so easy to use. For the price, this unit is incredible.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina girl

customer_reviews.title: Amazing MP3 player
customer_reviews.text: The first MP3 player I received did not work. The company was very prompt in replacing it and the 2nd one works amazing! Thank you so much Jessica and SEWOBYE for the great customer service. I am definitely a very satisfied customer. To anyone who is unsure of which waterproof MP3 player to buy, look no further, because you found the one! You will not regret your purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Great little MP3 player
customer_reviews.text: Such an awesome little MP3 player. I actually received this just before leaving out for the coast. I have enjoyed using it at the pool and not having to worry about it getting wet. This is a great investment for anyone around water, outside for long hours. I was shocked
customer_reviews.author: Tia Kitchens

customer_reviews.title: Can be used for audible books with tuneskit app conversion.
customer_reviews.text: New for me only swam twice so far. I used tuneskit to transfer audible book to mp3. Downloaded my book and enjoy my laps listening. When done press and hold play button 3second and when I swim next the book starts where I left off.
customer_reviews.author: Paul F

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I have swam many miles with this and its awesome, the only think i can fault it on is the shuffle, it seems like sometimes some songs get played a second time while others are skipped.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, good customer support.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in June 2019 and it worked fine until December, when it refused to charge. I contacted the vendor and they replaced the unit without any hassle. I swim for about an hour 5 days a week for exercise (not trying to train for competition) and it did the job nicely. The earbuds are reasonably comfortable and more durable than some others I've had. Other comments indicate that what I experienced is a common form of failure and the support person asked that I send the failed unit back, which I did. I hope they can figure out the problem because it is a nice little unit and reasonably priced
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Fine until you get in the water, and then it stops working.
customer_reviews.text: This MP3 player simply doesn't work. Well, it works if you don't go in the water, but it is supposed to be for swimming. Once you are in the water, it stops. Don't buy this! It is basically junk.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little MP3 player. Works really well when I swim laps. Clips onto my goggles as well as the strap of my swimming suit
customer_reviews.author: Wkm

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof MP3 player, perfect for workouts
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase. Lost the first one and dearly missed it for working out in the pool. I run in the lap/walk lane at the YMCA and I love the music as a motivation to move and keep me going longer. Great audio quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon K. Reid

customer_reviews.title: NOT WORTH THE MONEY
customer_reviews.text: i was able to load my music, but there was no sound, MP3 did not work out of the box. UPDATE: THIS IS A GREAT COMPANY, THEY RESPONDED TO MY COMPLIANT SWIFTLY!!!!! THEY ALSO RESOLVED MY ISSUE AND REPLACED PRODUCT WITH NO COST TO ME! MY NEW PRODUCT IS WORKING PERFECTLY, AND I AM VERY SATISFIED. WHAT REALLY MADE ME HAPPY IS THE FOLLOW-UP PHONE CALL TO ENSURE I RECEIVED THE NEW PRODUCT AND WAS HAPPY WITH IT!!!!! THIS IS REALLY A GREAT COMPANY AND GREAT PRODUCT. THIS PRODUCT GET ( 5 STARS ) THANK YOU SEWOBY
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: I’m spoiled!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Only issue are the ear buds options but I just used silicone ear plugs to block out the spaces in my ear and it worked like a charm. It made swimming laps much easier and fun
customer_reviews.author: Johanna R. Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a waterproof swim p3
customer_reviews.text: For the money this is a great product. It is a little hard to download music if you don't have a pc. I used a laptop with Windows 10 and it was very confusing but otherwise a GREAT product.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie Mallette

customer_reviews.title: Was great, stopped working after last charge.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this MP3 player, but all of sudden it just stopped working after being charged. Was working fine day prior to being charged. I am sad because I only used it about 10 times.
customer_reviews.author: MommaT

customer_reviews.title: Extremely water resistant & great sound quality!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this MP3 player for gym days and I love it. The sound quality is amazing and since I sweat like crazy it is great that it is water resistant. I especially love how long the battery last!
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great waterproof headset for swimming.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great headphones good swimming. I have used it a few times so far and works great. The sound quality under water is not too shabby either. Better than the Pyle I bought and died on me. Only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Jett

customer_reviews.title: Maybe my expectations were too high
customer_reviews.text: Ratings Price 5 stars Battery life 5 stars Fit 1 star (keep having to stop and re-adjust) Sound quality 1 star Programming and ease of use 4 stars. Easy to drop and drag files into the MP3. Easy to adjust sound and forward to next song or repeat while swimming. Again kept having to adjust earphones and cord (typically on swim turns) Unfortunately I will be requesting to return this item. This will be my first ever Amazon return.
customer_reviews.author: lesilvey

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and price
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for price. Easy to upload music. Company has excellent customer service! I had to get a replacement one when mine stopped working and they were quick to respond and send one out hassle free .
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: better than expected
customer_reviews.text: This is my first experience with an underwater MP3 player. Sound was better than expected. Makes staring at that line much more bearable and helped me swim farther/longer. I've only used it once so far but no issues whatsoever. Nice integrated clip... I clipped to my goggles but I think I will use it running as well.
customer_reviews.author: rhett hedrick

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, great price
customer_reviews.text: I just recently purchased this mp3 player, and have now used it a handful of times. I am coming off 10 years of using the waterproofed Ipod shuffle, and I can say that so far, this little device holds up very well. It attaches to your goggle strap just as the shuffle did, the battery life seems good, and the volume is even better than the ipod. No disruption when flipturning. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon B

customer_reviews.title: Lasted a year and a week
customer_reviews.text: First time using this in the pool today and it worked for one song, then stopped. Even when the unit was dry, it stopped playing music. It was good for a few months of working in a pool every weekend not sure if it is worth the price for one season.
customer_reviews.author: jane royal

customer_reviews.title: Earbuds are very uncomfortable and fell apart after one use
customer_reviews.text: Earbuds are very uncomfortable and fell apart after one use also no LED so you dont know where you are on an Audio book and have to just keep pushing forward or back to get to the place you want very inaccurately
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: One side of the headphone died
customer_reviews.text: One side of the headphone died after 3 uses. I will be contacting them for a 1 year warranty. Hopefully the next one works better. I will update the review after they replace it.
customer_reviews.author: JYdad

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT! Love it! Thank you so much! Great price! Will be ordering for my family too
customer_reviews.text: Great Product! I really love it! Now I can have awesome music while exercising in the pool. I also added some of my favorite personal development mp3 . Great price for such a cool product! I am a happy customer! Will be buying for my husband and son too (because the want to take mine :) Great to be used as gift in any occasion specially in summer :)
customer_reviews.author: Pilar

customer_reviews.title: Short life
customer_reviews.text: Christmas present that was loved by the recipient, until after 2 months unit would no longer charge. No reset button, nothing to be done but replace. Looking for something reliable, not having any luck.
customer_reviews.author: J.Adams

customer_reviews.title: Make Swimming fun again
customer_reviews.text: Music makes so much diffidence while I am swimming. With the right music and can get at least 3 times the workout of I do normally. This player works flawless, really a game changer in my daily swims.
customer_reviews.author: Mark M

customer_reviews.title: love this product!!
customer_reviews.text: i love being able to swim while listening to music. it doubles my work out!! this mp3 player was the only one i bought that actually worked! of course i needed to figure out mp3 converting etc etc but after i got it once it became easy. i took back 3 others to the store that never worked. i recommend this player!! enjoy!!
customer_reviews.author: c. brown

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working - Refunded and sent new one!
customer_reviews.text: After writing a review on the issue I had with the MP3 player- I was contacted by the seller and received a credit for the purchase and a replacement. They support their product which is great and really appreciated! I swim 3+ times a week for over an hour and was really wanting to listen to music to help past the time. At first these were pretty good, the sound quality went in and out, but it was not too bad. But, after 3 to 3 1/2 months it totally stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Abby Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof great for running
customer_reviews.text: Really dig this little MP3 player! Bought it for the soul purpose of using it at the gym and outdoors for hiking and running. The MP3 player comes with ear buds and charge cords. Really cool design and color way. This is small enough to easily clip on the side of your pants or to the collar of your shirt as well.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Lackey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put music on and is actually water proof. I had brought a different water proof MP3 player before this one and it was crap. This little thing works great! I am training for a triathlon and have been using it for when I swim and run. LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This works great for 1/2 the price of any others
customer_reviews.text: I swim almost everyday. I've had 2 I pod shuffle waterproof holders. The door latch broke on both of them after a few months of use. I got tired of them breaking so tried this one that is a lot cheaper. Glad I did. Battery life is great and sound is good. Bought one for my sister.
customer_reviews.author: dave nichols

customer_reviews.title: Works well for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Have used it 5 times for 1 hour swims each time. Have not charged yet. Sound is great. Attach it to my google strap and easy to turn on, off, volume and skipping songs. I have 8 hours of songs on it right now.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I use it for lap swimming. Loud and secure. It would be nice if it had track repeat as well as track shuffle, but that's a minor point. Drag and drop to load mp3 files works well.
customer_reviews.author: PWB

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we were looking for! First off, the color blue is fun & stylish. My daughters love it. Music is life to them and this was just perfect for them. It’s a perfect gift for all music lovers! My daughters have been taking it along with them everywhere they go. The battery life is pretty good and the sound quality is awesome. Not only is it waterproof, it’s perfect to use at all times!
customer_reviews.author: JBsMama

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product at first, sound quality was good. Fun to have so much of my music to listen to while exercising in the pool. Did not have it very long before it quit working.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Very good sound definition
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice waterproof MP3 player! It came well packaged and on time. It is nice and small but it still has really great sound definition and volume. Once in the water it still sounds just as good. You will like this! It is definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Stackhouse

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, easy set up, and secures perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Used for daily lap swim. Great sound, easy set up, and secures perfectly on google strap.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding sound and speedy customer service
customer_reviews.text: Although the original unit worked for only 3 weeks, a replacement came in 2 days, the audio sounds wonderful, and the battery is holding it's charge. This is probably the best value in the waterproof player category.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Fussy

customer_reviews.title: Water Aerobics
customer_reviews.text: So excited to use this! Made water aerobics so much better listening to music!! Time flew by:)
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Is waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Used it for a 20 min workout in pool. Still works. It’s loud. The head phones are tricky to keep in while swimming. I downloaded about 20 sounds but when I put shuffle it kept playing 5 sounds over and over so not sure what’s the problem. I’ll update my experience next couple of swims. Update, they fall out during swimming and I tried a couple things to get them to stay, not worth it for what it’s meant for.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but now it won't charge
customer_reviews.text: This MP3 player is mostly great. Bought it to go swimming with and listen to music. It has good sound quality. Good headphones. Like the buttons. Easy plug n play kind to just drop music into it. BUT now it's not being recognized by the computer by the data transfer/charging cable. It won't charge and I'm stuck with whatever songs I put on it, between now and the remainder of it's current battery life. Maybe mine is defective, but other than this charging/addingsongs issue it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Anna G.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome MP3 player
customer_reviews.text: Best MP3 player ever! My daughter really enjoyed using The waterproof shuffles While play swimming in the bathtub!I love that she also could use her MP3 player while getting her hair wash! She takes her MP3 player everywhere! It also came with earbuds with different sizes. I was able to find the perfect match for a tiny ears.This purchase what is the best thing ever
customer_reviews.author: Devany

customer_reviews.title: Hard to figure out but...
customer_reviews.text: This was hard to figure out how to add songs from computer, but once I figured it out and finally got it working, it is great. I haven't tried it in the pool yet, but hoping the "waterproof" part works too.
customer_reviews.author: becky webb

customer_reviews.title: excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this mp3 player, easy to use and sound quality is good. The seller is very good at communication, and will help address any concerns that might come up. I highly recommend both the product and the seller!
customer_reviews.author: David T.

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable device
customer_reviews.text: The product developed a problem with its ability to connect to any computer via USB and I can no longer load music onto it. I have had it for less than 6 months and will be returning it. Also, the earphones provided are fairly temperamental and don't really work if you get so much as a drop of water into them. This is pretty easy to do if you remove them at all while in the water, even if not submerged. I would not purchase this device again.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: still works after several month of use at least 3 times a week. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: A. C. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: We loved this waterproof MP3. It’s great for when you need to do some laps around the pool or even at the beach because you can listen to your favorite music all while in the water. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Karina Ordonez

customer_reviews.title: Best mp3 for daily use
customer_reviews.text: Our son absolutely loves his MP3 player and the blue is his favorite color too! It is nice and clear and he's been listening to it daily. Such a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: MomOfTwo

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality and customer service
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and no problem using it while I swim under water for 30 mins or longer. Jessica at Customer Service is very professional and helpful in sending me the replacement MP3 player and I hope I will not have to bother her again anytime soon in the next 10 months.
customer_reviews.author: peter.chu@sbcglobal.net

customer_reviews.title: Great For Swimming Laps
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to download music to and great to listen to while swimming!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I had an issue with the earphones. So, I went on-line and contacted their customer service department. Within one day, they contacted via email and gave me a coupon to buy new earphones which work great. I've only used the player for one week in the pool and they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: SEWOBYE Waterproof MP3 Player for Swimming and Running,Underwater Headphones with Short Cord, Shuffle Feature
feature_bullets: The Best waterproof mp3 player for the lap or marathon swimmer. Small with a clip-on attachment feature that works on goggle or swimsuit straps. The control buttons have been designed with raised ridges that are perfect for wet finger-tips. This Swimming waterproof mp3 player is elegant in its design. No rough edges and very smooth to touch. Once you read the operating instructions, you can operate the player without looking during swimming.

HIFI Lossless Sound Quality; Great sound under/out water; Download all your favorite music from your computer & audiobook, support Audio Formats: MP3, WMA, FLAC, APE(no need convert software).16 hours of play time and memory capacity of over 2,000 songs (8 GB). This device allows you to shuffle through all your music in the memory; 100% Waterproof with gold plated stereo jack to prevent corrosion. Waterproof down to 10 feet.Waterproof Rating: IPX8.

Short cord swimming headphones are perfect for swimmers for swimming in music, no more wrapping long lengths of cord around goggle straps! And one more audio extension cord is for different activities in need.
This swimming waterproof mp3 player has versatility beyond swimming and can be used with activities in which you might get wet. Running, surfing, Skiing or kayaking comes to mind.
It's great for swimmers to avoid boring while listening to music. We do believe you will like it and satisfied with this waterproof mp3 player .

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars375 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
